Notes: The liquidating trustee in charge of the bankruptcy of RadioShack gave permission to the estate to pay $41 million to resolve two lawsuits -- Sisson and Wills -- concerning the company's practices relating to overtime calculations for store managers.

The liquidating trustee in charge of the bankruptcy of RadioShack gave permission to the estate to pay $5.5 million to resolve an overtime class action that had received preliminary approval in the Eastern District of Pennsylvania  -- 13-cv-2539 -- but was then suspended when RadioShack filed for bankruptcy.
